Title: Magical Thinking
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Wes Jones (teleplay by), Wes Jones (story by), Heidi Schreck (story by)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Axe deals with emotional turbulence after misreading a potential trade.
